description:
Monster Salon Manager — where fangs, fur, and facials go hand in hand.

You’ve just opened your very own care center for monsters, and they’re lining up with sore wings, muddy scales, and a whole lot of stress. It’s your job to pamper, heal, and spoil every creature that crawls, slithers, or stomps through your doors.

Start with a modest setup and grow into a legendary monster wellness empire. Treat quirky clients, hatch rare eggs, and train your own lovable beasties into majestic companions. Whether you're giving a hydra a hot stone massage or playing fetch with a fire-breathing pup, every monster needs a little tender loving care.

Upgrade your salon, hire a loyal crew, decorate your own cozy upstairs pad, and create a relaxing haven—because even chaos gremlins deserve a day off.

It’s cute, it’s chaotic, and yes—someone’s probably shedding on the carpet again.
